name: Simulator of Russia Premium
description:
Would you like to become president of Russia? We will give you the opportunity.
In the game you will have the ability to manage internal processes, to make war, to develop the economy.

Advantages of the full version:
- No advertising
- Full map (163 countries from all continents)

Key game features:
- Management eleven ministries
- Construction of factories and mines
- The development of agriculture
- Warfighting and the capture of countries
- The development of service
- Selection of the country's development path.

Do not forget to pay attention to your personal security, the leader should be safe!
Defeat corruption in his country. Get a 100% trust of the people.
Good luck, Mr. President!
